name: Pro-Tec Athletics 3D Flat Ankle Sleeve
description: Soft and breathable, this ankle sleeve is more comfortable than neoprene types. The knitting technique and stitching lets it conform to the shape of your ankle to support you with minor to moderate ankle sprains and strains.Stretches in multiple directions for full range of motion.Small fits men’s shoe size 5-7, women’s 5-7.5Medium fits men’s shoe size 7.5-10, women’s 8-10.5.Large fits men’s shoe size 10.5-12.5, women’s 11-13.Extra-large fits men’s shoe size 13+, women’s 13.5+.If you have narrow feet or ankles, it’s recommended to go one size smaller.
